Scenario (Energy Conserved): A skateboarder glides up and down the inside of a semi-circular ramp.
Not Conserved (Energy Not Conserved): A skateboarder rolls up and down a semi-circular ramp made of rough concrete.

Scenario (Energy Conserved): A child on a swing moves back and forth in a smooth arc.
Not Conserved (Energy Not Conserved): A child on a swing is being pushed by the parent to moves back and forth in a smooth arc.

Scenario (Energy Conserved): A projectile is fired from a cannon and follows a parabolic trajectory.
Not Conserved (Energy Not Conserved): A projectile is fired from a cannon and hits a target under water.

Scenario (Energy Conserved): A pinball rolls along a smooth track that has several hills and valleys.
Not Conserved (Energy Not Conserved): A pinball rolls along a rough track that has several hills and valleys.

Scenario (Energy Conserved): A diver jumps from a platform and falls towards the water below.
Not Conserved (Energy Not Conserved): A diver wearing a small rocket pack jumps from a platform, firing the pack on the way down.

Scenario (Energy Conserved): A block attached to a horizontal spring oscillates back and forth on a smooth, level table.
Not Conserved (Energy Not Conserved): A block attached to a horizontal spring oscillates back and forth across a carpeted floor.

Scenario (Energy Conserved): A cart on a smooth, level track is launched from rest by a rapidly expanding spring.
Not Conserved (Energy Not Conserved): A fan-powered cart on a level track is launched from rest by an expanding spring while the fan is turned on.

Scenario (Energy Conserved): A bowling ball rolling along a smooth floor is brought to a stop by a horizontal bungee cord.
Not Conserved (Energy Not Conserved): A bowling ball rolls across a sandy lane before being stopped by a horizontal bungee cord.

Scenario (Energy Conserved): An arrow is being shot from a bow, propelled horizontally as the drawn bowstring snaps back.
Not Conserved (Energy Not Conserved): An arrow is shot from a bow against strong headwind

Scenario (Energy Conserved): A compressed spring between two carts on a smooth, horizontal track is released, pushing them apart.
Not Conserved (Energy Not Conserved): A compressed spring between two carts on a gravel-covered track is released, pushing them apart.

Scenario (Energy Conserved): A mass hanging from a vertical spring is pulled down and released, causing it to oscillate.
Not Conserved (Energy Not Conserved): A mass hangs from a vertical spring under water, oscillating up and down.

Scenario (Energy Conserved): A bungee jumper leaps from a high platform, falling until the elastic cord stretches and rebounds.
Not Conserved (Energy Not Conserved): A bungee jumper leaps from a high platform on a very windy day, falling until the elastic cord stretches and rebounds.

Scenario (Energy Conserved): A child bounces up and down on a pogo stick.
Not Conserved (Energy Not Conserved): A child bounces up and down on a pogo stick in a muddy field.

Scenario (Energy Conserved): A ball is shot straight up into the air by a compressed spring launcher on the ground.
Not Conserved (Energy Not Conserved): A small model rocket is launched straight up by a compressed spring from under water.

Scenario (Energy Conserved): An apple falls from a tree, landing on and compressing a vertical spring below it.
Not Conserved (Energy Not Conserved): An apple falls from a tree, landing on a vertical spring that is submerged in a bucket of thick oil.

Scenario (Energy Conserved): A ball attached to a string is swung in a horizontal circle at a constant speed.
A car travels at a steady speed around a banked curve.
A passenger rides on a merry-go-round that is moving at a constant speed, holding on to the center pole.
A child rides on a playground roundabout spinning at a constant speed, holding on to the rail.
